relevant_findings.general: Acutely-ill appearing lady, in no acute distress, lying in bed comfortably.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Icteric sclerae, PERLL, mucous membranes dry, OP with faint erythema, no mucositis.
relevant_findings.cardiac: Regular rate and rhythm, normal heart sounds, no murmurs, rubs or gallops.
relevant_findings.lung: Appears in no respiratory distress, clear to auscultation bilaterally, no crackles, wheezes or rhonchi.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Non-distended, normal bowel sounds, soft, non-tender, no guarding, no palpable masses, no organomegaly.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused. No lower extremity edema. No erythema or tenderness.
relevant_findings.neurological: A&Ox3, good attention and linear thought, CN II-XII intact. Strength full throughout. Sensation to light touch intact.
relevant_findings.port: Faint erythema surrounding site of port matching surface of transparent dressing, mild tenderness on palpation.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial examination revealed no significant changes. By discharge, the patient was still acutely ill appearing, but without additional significant relevant findings.

relevant_findings.general: Comfortable appearing lady, in no acute distress, lying in bed comfortably.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Icteric sclerae, PERLL, mucous membranes dry, OP with faint erythema, no mucositis.
relevant_findings.cardiac: Regular rate and rhythm, normal heart sounds, no murmurs, rubs or gallops.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Non-distended, normal bowel sounds, soft, non-tender, no guarding, no palpable masses, no organomegaly.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused. No lower extremity edema. Tenderness to palpation in bilateral calves.
relevant_findings.neurological: A&Ox3, good attention and linear thought, CN II-XII intact. Strength full throughout. Sensation to light touch intact.
relevant_findings.port: Faint erythema surrounding site of port matching surface of transparent dressing, mild tenderness on palpation at 7 o'clock in port.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No significant change in general appearance noted; however, tenderness in bilateral calves was a new finding at discharge.
